question.para: I just sucessfully compiled and installed libgphoto2-2.2.1. But when configuring gphoto2-2.1.1 I get Library requirements (libgphoto2 >= 2.1.1) not met

answer.para: If you don't have pkg-config installed yet, then please install it.
Otherwise, your PKG_CONFIG_PATH variable doesn't contain the pkgconfig/ directory in the lib/ directory of your libgphoto2 installation.
For a default installation, run &prompt;PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/local/lib/pkgconfig &prompt;export PKG_CONFIG_PATH and now run the gphoto2 ./configure again.
